title: Skin "Molten Zac"
body:
Molten Zac as seen in the image would be zac made from lava/molten rocks his effects when attacking would be that instead of goo lava comes out.
as for abilities and effects it's as follows

"Passive" Would have have small rocks covered in lava .
"Q" would be the same but t  it would have a lava effect.
"W" would show Zac exploding  and lava coming out and leaving a scorch mark .
"E" would  have when Zac lands he makes a eruption like a volcano .
"R" would have the same effects as his E but repeated .

"jokes and taunts and recall and taunts"

His recall could be that he  raises his first and makes  a volcano come out of the ground and erupt him back to his base 

If you have any other ideas feel free to add them

replies.body:
yea a great idea
 maybe when his passive ends the blobs could get sucked into the ground and burst up
Can't wait to build Liandries on this skin!
Yeah this is actually a really good idea though I think making his R have a different, more powerful animation to his E would really give it some weight.

For an idea when he recalls, Zac could start to create some kind of explosion inside of him, getting ready to erupt and burst him to the platform. 

Just a thought......
ground turns into volcano and erupts him to the platform.
Yeah, or that, but Riot seriously needs to make a skin for Zac now. He WAY overdue for one
Cool idea I reckon Rito can make something cool off this.

They better.

Zac makes me wet.
